Text: Hurricane: Category 5:  The Pavilion unveiled their multimillion-dollar coaster May 6, 2000.

Text: Hurricane: Category 5:  Although Burroughs & Chapin attempted to sell the ride along with the Haunted Hotel, Log Flume, Treasure Hunt, and a few other rides, the ride was deemed too expensive a task to dismantle and relocate, and was ultimately demolished in March 2007.

Text: Hurricane: Category 5:  The only part of the ride not demolished were the two Gerstlauer trains used on the ride.
